explains: adj. 流行的，时髦的；有钱人光顾的

sentences.en: It became fashionable to eat certain kinds of fish.
sentences.cn: 吃某些种类的鱼变得时髦了。

sentences.en: Such thinking is fashionable among right-wing politicians.
sentences.cn: 在政界右翼人士中这种想法很流行。

sentences.en: All shades of mauve, lilac, lavender and purple were fashionable.
sentences.cn: 所有紫红色、淡紫粉色、淡紫色和紫色都很流行。
